                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
and <Math mode="inline" tex="(\tilde{\varphi_{1}},\dots,\tilde{\varphi_{n}})" text="vector@(tilde@(varphi _ 1), dots, tilde@(varphi _ n))" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47.2">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S2.Thmthm3.p1.m47.3">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> share many
features in common and, from some points of view, are interchangeable.</p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" xml:id="S3">
    <tags>
      <tag>3</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§3</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=". ">3</tag>The Deaconu-Renault Groupoid</title>
    <toctitle><tag close=" ">3</tag>The Deaconu-Renault Groupoid</toctitle>
    <para xml:id="S3.p1">
      <p>The Deaconu-Renault groupoid associated with the local homeomorphism
<Math mode="inline" tex="T:X\to X" text="T colon X to X" xml:id="S3.p1.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex4">
        <Math mode="display" tex="G=\{(x,n,y)\in X\times\mathbb{Z}\times X\;:\;T^{k}(x)=T^{l}(y),n=k-l\}." text="G = conditional-set@(vector@(x, n, y) element-of X * Z * X, formulae@(T ^ k * x = T ^ l * y, n = k - l))" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="conditional-set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.3">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="2.8pt">X</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP" rpadding="2.8pt">:</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.6.2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.4"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.4">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex4.m1.5"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.5">y</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex4.m1.6.2.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>Two triples <Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{1},n_{1},y_{1})" text="vector@(x _ 1, n _ 1, y _ 1)" xml:id="S3.p1.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m2.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m2.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m2.3"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m2.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m2.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m2.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{2},n_{2},y_{2})" text="vector@(x _ 2, n _ 2, y _ 2)" xml:id="S3.p1.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m3.2"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m3.3"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m3.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m3.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m3.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are
composable if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{2}=y_{1}" text="x _ 2 = y _ 1" xml:id="S3.p1.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and in that case,
<Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{1},n_{1},y_{1})(x_{2},n_{2},y_{2})=(x_{1},n_{1}+n_{2},y_{2})" text="vector@(x _ 1, n _ 1, y _ 1) * vector@(x _ 2, n _ 2, y _ 2) = vector@(x _ 1, n _ 1 + n _ 2, y _ 2)" xml:id="S3.p1.m5">
          <XMath>

The inverse of <Math mode="inline" tex="(x,n,y)" text="vector@(x, n, y)" xml:id="S3.p1.m6">

        </Math>. A basis for the topology

      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex5">

      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S3.p1.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p1.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are open subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p1.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{k}|U" text="conditional@(T ^ k, U)" xml:id="S3.p1.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="T^{l}|V" text="conditional@(T ^ l, V)" xml:id="S3.p1.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="conditional" role="MODIFIEROP" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are homeomorphisms and <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{k}(U)=T^{l}(V)" text="T ^ k * U = T ^ l * V" xml:id="S3.p1.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m14.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m14.1">U</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m14.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m14.2">V</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Thus <Math mode="inline" tex="Z(U,V,k,l)" text="Z * vector@(U, V, k, l)" xml:id="S3.p1.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m15.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m15.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m15.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m15.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m15.1">U</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m15.2">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m15.3">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m15.4">l</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is essentially the graph of <Math mode="inline" tex="(T^{l}|_{V})^{-1}\circ(T^{k}|_{U})" text="(evaluated-at@(T ^ l, V)) ^ (- 1) compose evaluated-at@(T ^ k, U)" xml:id="S3.p1.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m16.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S3.p1.m16.3">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="evaluated-at"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m16.3.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m16.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m16.3.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m16.1">V</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m16.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S3.p1.m16.4">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="evaluated-at"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m16.4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m16.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.p1.m16.4.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m16.2">U</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
and is a <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S3.p1.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-set in the sense of Renault <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="jR80" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. The <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S3.p1.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-sets
form a pseudogroup <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathfrak{G}" text="G" xml:id="S3.p1.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="fraktur" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, viz. the pseudogroup of partial
homeomorphisms generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="S3.p1.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The sets <Math mode="inline" tex="Z(U,V,k,l)" text="Z * vector@(U, V, k, l)" xml:id="S3.p1.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m21.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m21.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m21.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p1.m21.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m21.1">U</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m21.2">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m21.3">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p1.m21.4">l</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> form a basis
for <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathfrak{G}" text="G" xml:id="S3.p1.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="fraktur" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The groupoid <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S3.p1.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is (isomorphic and homeomorphic
to) the groupoid of germs of <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathfrak{G}" text="G" xml:id="S3.p1.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="fraktur" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> precisely when the local
<!--  %**** String Line 250 **** -->homeomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="S3.p1.m25">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is essentially free, meaning that for no <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S3.p1.m26">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S3.p1.m27">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> does <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{m}=T^{n}" text="T ^ m = T ^ n" xml:id="S3.p1.m28">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on any open subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p1.m29">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="jR00" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 2.8]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p2">
      <p>The groupoid <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S3.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="r" text="r" xml:id="S3.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-discrete or étale and so admits a Haar
system of counting measures. Consequently, we may define a <Math mode="inline" tex="*" text="*" xml:id="S3.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra
structure on <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{c}(G)" text="C _ c * G" xml:id="S3.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m4.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m4.1">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> as follows. For <Math mode="inline" tex="f,g\in C_{c}(G)" text="list@(f, g) element-of C _ c * G" xml:id="S3.p2.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m5.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m5.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m5.2">f</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m5.3">g</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p2.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p2.m5.1">G</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> we
set</p>

      <p>where the sum ranges over all <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S3.p2.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S3.p2.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="z" text="z" xml:id="S3.p2.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{m}x=T^{n}z" text="T ^ m * x = T ^ n * z" xml:id="S3.p2.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and <Math mode="inline" tex="T^{n+k}z=T^{m+l}y" text="T ^ (n + k) * z = T ^ (m + l) * y" xml:id="S3.p2.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and we define</p>
      <equation xml:id="S3.Ex7">
        <Math mode="display" tex="f^{*}(x,k-l,y)=\overline{f(y,l-k,x)}." text="f ^ * * vector@(x, k - l, y) = overline@(f * vector@(y, l - k, x))" xml:id="S3.Ex7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex7.m1.6"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex7.m1.6">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>

                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                    </XMDual>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>

                        <XMWrap>

          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>The algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{c}(G)" text="C _ c * G" xml:id="S3.p2.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>

    <para xml:id="S3.p3">
      <p>For fixed positive integers <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S3.p3.m1">

Evidently, <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{n,m}" text="R _ (list@(n, m))" xml:id="S3.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m4.1"/>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m4.1">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m4.2">m</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a union of the basic sets <Math mode="inline" tex="Z(U,V,m,n)" text="Z * vector@(U, V, m, n)" xml:id="S3.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              <XMDual>

                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m5.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m5.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m5.1">U</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m5.2">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m5.3">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m5.4">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
<!--  %**** String Line 275 **** -->and so is open in <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S3.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. It is also closed, since its complement is
open by virtue of being a union of sets of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="Z(U,V,k,l)" text="Z * vector@(U, V, k, l)" xml:id="S3.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m7.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m7.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m7.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m7.1">U</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m7.2">V</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m7.3">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m7.4">l</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
with <Math mode="inline" tex="(k,l)\neq(m,n)" text="open-interval@(k, l) not-equals open-interval@(m, n)" xml:id="S3.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m8.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m8.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m8.1">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m8.2">l</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m8.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m8.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m8.3">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m8.4">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The sets <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{n,m}" text="R _ (list@(n, m))" xml:id="S3.p3.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

          </XMath>
        </Math>, with <Math mode="inline" tex="m=n" text="m = n" xml:id="S3.p3.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

            </XMApp>

        </Math>, are of special
importance: <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{0,0}" text="R _ (list@(0, 0))" xml:id="S3.p3.m11">

            <XMApp>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> may be identified with the diagonal <Math mode="inline" tex="\Delta" text="Delta" xml:id="S3.p3.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
          </XMath>

in <Math mode="inline" tex="X\times X" text="X * X" xml:id="S3.p3.m13">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, while for <Math mode="inline" tex="k&gt;0" text="k &gt; 0" xml:id="S3.p3.m14">

          </XMath>
        </Math> may be identified with
the relation <Math mode="inline" tex="X\ast_{T^{k}}X:=\{(x,y):T^{k}(x)=T^{k}(x)\}" text="X ast _ (T ^ k) X assign conditional-set@(open-interval@(x, y), T ^ k * x = T ^ k * x)" xml:id="S3.p3.m16">

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, which may be
identified with the closure of <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{c}(R_{k,k})" text="C _ c * R _ (list@(k, k))" xml:id="S3.p3.m21">
          <XMath>

                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m21.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(G)" text="C ^ * * G" xml:id="S3.p3.m22">

            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, is
the cross sectional <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p3.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra of a matrix bundle over <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p3.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
and, therefore, is a continuous trace <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p3.m25">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra. (See <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="aK85" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>
for a discussion of algebras of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{k,k})" text="C ^ * * R _ (list@(k, k))" xml:id="S3.p3.m26">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m26.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m26.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m26.1"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m26.1">k</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m26.2">k</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.) The sequence
of inclusions <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{0,0}\subset R_{1,1}\subset R_{2,2}\subset\cdots" text="R _ (list@(0, 0)) subset-of R _ (list@(1, 1)) subset-of R _ (list@(2, 2)) subset-of cdots" xml:id="S3.p3.m27">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMApp>

                  <XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m27.1">0</XMTok>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m27.2">0</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m27.4">1</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m27.5"/>

                  </XMApp>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m27.5">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m27.6">2</XMTok>

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
              <XMTok name="cdots" role="ID">⋯</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
leads to the sequence of inclusions <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{k,k})\subset C^{*}(R_{k+1,k+1})" text="C ^ * * R _ (list@(k, k)) subset-of C ^ * * R _ (list@(k + 1, k + 1))" xml:id="S3.p3.m28">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of" name="subset" role="RELOP">⊂</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m28.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m28.5">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m28.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m28.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m28.1">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m28.2">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m28.6"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m28.6">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m28.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m28.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m28.3">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m28.4">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="k=0,1,2,\ldots" text="k = list@(0, 1, 2, ldots)" xml:id="S3.p3.m29">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m29.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m29.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m29.3"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m29.4"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m29.1">0</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m29.2">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.p3.m29.3">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S3.p3.m29.4">…</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and, consequently, we see that if <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{\infty}=\{(x,0,y)\;:\;T^{n}x=T^{n}y\mbox{ for some }n\}=\bigcup R_{n,n}" text="R _ infinity = conditional-set@(vector@(x, 0, y), T ^ n * x = T ^ n * y * [ for some ] * n) = union@(R _ (list@(n, n)))" xml:id="S3.p3.m30">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                  <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP" rpadding="2.8pt">:</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p3.m30.7">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
, then <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\ast}(R_{\infty})" text="C ^ ast * R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.p3.m32">

        </Math> is the inductive limit

We note that <Math mode="inline" tex="R_{\infty}" text="R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.p3.m34">
          <XMath>

        </Math> is the kernel of the fundamental homomorphism
on <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S3.p3.m35">
          <XMath>

          </XMath>

group <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\gamma_{z}\}_{z\in\mathbb{T}}" text="(set@(gamma _ z)) _ (z element-of T)" xml:id="S3.p3.m37">

        </Math> by
the formula <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma_{z}(f)(x,n,y)=z^{n}f(x,n,y)" text="gamma _ z * f * vector@(x, n, y) = z ^ n * f * vector@(x, n, y)" xml:id="S3.p3.m39">

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The algebra
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})" text="C ^ * * R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.p3.m40">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m40.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is the fixed point algebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="\{\gamma_{z}\}_{z\in\mathbb{T}}" text="(set@(gamma _ z)) _ (z element-of T)" xml:id="S3.p3.m41">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>

                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
also known as the <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">core</text> of <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(G)" text="C ^ * * G" xml:id="S3.p3.m42">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p3.m42.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p3.m42.1">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. For these things, and
more, we refer the reader to <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="DKM01,jR00" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>.
<!--  %**** String Line 300 **** --></p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S3.p4">
      <p>It is a straightforward calculation, performed first by Deaconu <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="vD95" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>,
to see that the local homeomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="S3.p4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p4.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> induces a <Math mode="inline" tex="*" text="*" xml:id="S3.p4.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-endomorphism
<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha:C^{\ast}(R_{\infty})\to C^{\ast}(R_{\infty})" text="alpha colon C ^ ast * R _ infinity to C ^ ast * R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.p4.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m4.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m4.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m4.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> defined by
the equation,</p>

      <p>is an isometry that implements <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p4.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in the sense that</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:Stacey1" xml:id="S3.E3">
        <tags>
          <tag>(3)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="\alpha(f)=SfS^{\ast}," text="alpha * f = S * f * S ^ ast" xml:id="S3.E3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.E3.m1.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.E3.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E3.m1.1">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p><Math mode="inline" tex="f\in C_{c}(R_{\infty})" text="f element-of C _ c * R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.p4.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. In particular, observe that</p>
      <equation labels="LABEL:eq:Stacey2" xml:id="S3.E4">
        <tags>
          <tag>(4)</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
        </tags>
        <Math mode="display" tex="SS^{*}(x,k-l,y)=\frac{1}{|T^{-1}(Tx)|}1_{R_{1,1}}(x,k-l,y)." text="S * S ^ * * vector@(x, k - l, y) = (1 / absolute-value@(T ^ (- 1) * T * x)) * 1 _ R _ (list@(1, 1)) * vector@(x, k - l, y)" xml:id="S3.E4.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.8"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.8">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.8.1"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.8.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E4.m1.5">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.1.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.E4.m1.2">1</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.E4.m1.3">1</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.6"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.8.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.E4.m1.7"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E4.m1.6">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S3.E4.m1.8.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.E4.m1.7">y</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>As we shall see, <Math mode="inline" tex="S" text="S" xml:id="S3.p4.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the source of all the isometries in the
papers by Jorgensen et. al. It is an intrinsic feature of the <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p4.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra
that comes from the basic data: <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p4.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and the local homeomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="S3.p4.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
In fact, we have the following theorem, Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:StaceyXpdRep"/>,
that makes precise the assertion that <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\ast}(G)" text="C ^ ast * G" xml:id="S3.p4.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m14.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m14.1">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the universal
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\ast}" text="C ^ ast" xml:id="S3.p4.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})" text="C ^ * * R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.p4.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m16.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p4.m16.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p4.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and <Math mode="inline" tex="S" text="S" xml:id="S3.p4.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. In fact, there are several different perspectives from which
to see how <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(G)" text="C ^ * * G" xml:id="S3.p4.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p4.m19.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p4.m19.1">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is constructed from the space <Math mode="inline" tex="X" text="X" xml:id="S3.p4.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and local
<!--  %**** String Line 325 **** -->homeomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="S3.p4.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We want to examine these and to compare them with
various approaches in the literature. Therefore the proof will be
given after further discussion.</p>
    </para>

          <item xml:id="S3.I1.i2">

            <para xml:id="S3.I1.i2.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(\mathcal{L}(f))=S_{+}^{\ast}\pi(f)S_{+}" text="pi * L * f = (S _ +) ^ ast * pi * f * S _ +" xml:id="S3.I1.i2.p1.m1">

                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.I1.i2.p1.m1.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.i2.p1.m1.2">f</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">, where
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{L}(f)=S^{\ast}fS" text="L * f = S ^ ast * f * S" xml:id="S3.I1.i2.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.I1.i2.p1.m2.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I1.i2.p1.m2.1">f</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math><text font="italic">
is the transfer operator associated with </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.I1.i2.p1.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>

        <p><text font="italic">Conversely, given <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,S_{+})" text="open-interval@(pi, S _ +)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m6">

            </Math>, where

for all <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in C^{\ast}(R_{\infty})" text="f element-of C ^ ast * R _ infinity" xml:id="S3.Thmthm1.p1.m13">
