    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S3.p5">
      <p>Recall, next, that if <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p5.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra, then a
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p5.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-<text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">correspondence
over</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p5.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p5.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-<Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p5.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-bimodule <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p5.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="E_{A}" text="E _ A" xml:id="S3.p5.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a Hilbert
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p5.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-module and the left action is given by a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p5.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-homomorphism
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S3.p5.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> from <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p5.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> into the bounded adjointable operators on <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p5.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="MS98" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{L}(E)" text="L * E" xml:id="S3.p5.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p5.m14.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p5.m14.1">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We write <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{K}(E)" text="K * E" xml:id="S3.p5.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p5.m15.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p5.m15.1">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for the space of compact
operators on <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p5.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, i.e., <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{K}(E)" text="K * E" xml:id="S3.p5.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p5.m17.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p5.m17.1">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the closed linear span
of the operators <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi\otimes\eta^{*}" text="xi tensor-product eta ^ *" xml:id="S3.p5.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi,\eta\in E" text="list@(xi, eta) element-of E" xml:id="S3.p5.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p5.m19.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p5.m19.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p5.m19.1">ξ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p5.m19.2">η</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, defined
by the formula <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi\otimes\eta^{*}(\zeta):=\xi\langle\eta,\zeta\rangle" text="(xi tensor-product eta ^ *) * zeta assign xi * list@(eta, zeta)" xml:id="S3.p5.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p5.m20.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and we write <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S3.p5.m21">
          <XMath>

          </XMath>

              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p5.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
A <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">Cuntz-Pimsner covariant representation</text> of <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p5.m24">

            <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi,\eta\in E" text="list@(xi, eta) element-of E" xml:id="S3.I2.i2.p1.m1">

                              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I2.i2.p1.m2.3">ξ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I2.i2.p1.m2.4">η</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>;
and</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S3.I2.i3">
          <tags>
            <tag>(3)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 3</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1">
            <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in J" text="a element-of J" xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="(\psi,\pi)^{(1)}(\phi(a))=\pi(a)" text="(open-interval@(psi, pi)) ^ 1 * phi * a = pi * a" xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.I2.i3.p1.m2.2"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.I2.i3.p1.m2.3"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                        <XMDual>

                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>

                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I2.i3.p1.m2.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\psi,\pi)^{(1)}" text="(open-interval@(psi, pi)) ^ 1" xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                      <XMApp>

                      <XMWrap>

                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1.m3.3">π</XMTok>

is the representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{K}(E)" text="K * E" xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1.m4">

                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> defined by the
formula <Math mode="inline" tex="(\psi,\pi)^{(1)}(\xi\otimes\eta^{*})=\psi(\xi)\psi(\eta)^{*}" text="(open-interval@(psi, pi)) ^ 1 * (xi tensor-product eta ^ *) = psi * xi * psi * eta ^ *" xml:id="S3.I2.i3.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.I2.i3.p1.m6.6"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                </XMath>
              </Math>,

      <p>There is a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p6.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{O}(E)" text="O * E" xml:id="S3.p6.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">O</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p6.m2.1">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and Cuntz-Pimsner representation
<Math mode="inline" tex="(k_{A},k_{E})" text="open-interval@(k _ A, k _ E)" xml:id="S3.p6.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m3.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m3.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p6.m3.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S3.p6.m3.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p6.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{O}(E)" text="O * E" xml:id="S3.p6.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">O</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p6.m5.1">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> that is universal for
all Cuntz-Pimsner representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p6.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. That is, if <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,\psi)" text="open-interval@(pi, psi)" xml:id="S3.p6.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m7.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m7.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p6.m7.1">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p6.m7.2">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is a Cuntz-Pimsner representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="E" text="E" xml:id="S3.p6.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p6.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p6.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
then there is a unique <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p6.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S3.p6.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{O}(E)" text="O * E" xml:id="S3.p6.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">O</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p6.m13.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p6.m13.1">E</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
in <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p6.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho\circ k_{A}=\pi" text="rho compose k _ A = pi" xml:id="S3.p6.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho\circ k_{E}=\psi" text="rho compose k _ E = psi" xml:id="S3.p6.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
. The representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S3.p6.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is often denoted <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi\times\psi" text="pi * psi" xml:id="S3.p6.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This
was proved essentially by Pimsner in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="mP97" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and in the form
stated here in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="FMR03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 1.3]</cite>.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Definition 3.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 3.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 3.2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1">
        <p>The <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">Deaconu <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-correspondence</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{X}" text="X" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> over the
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\ast}" text="C ^ ast" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="C(X)" text="C * X" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m4.1">X</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the completion of <Math mode="inline" tex="C(X)" text="C * X" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m5.1">X</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> under the
inner product</p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex9">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\langle\xi,\eta\rangle(x)=\frac{1}{|T^{-1}(x)|}\sum_{Ty=x}\overline{\xi(y)}%&#10;\eta(y)," text="list@(xi, eta) * x = (1 / absolute-value@(T ^ (- 1) * x)) * (sum _ (T * y = x))@(overline@(xi * y) * eta * y)" xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.8"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1.8">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1.4">ξ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1.5">η</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.6"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1.6">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex9.m1.1">x</XMTok>

                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex9.m1.3"/>

                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>

                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>with the left and right actions of <Math mode="inline" tex="C(X)" text="C * X" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m6.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> given by <Math mode="inline" tex="(a\cdot\xi\cdot b)(x)=a(x)\xi(x)b(Tx)" text="(a cdot xi cdot b) * x = a * x * xi * x * b * T * x" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.4">
                        <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.2">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.3">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p1.m7.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2">
        <p>The definition we have given is slightly different from the one given
in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="vD99" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. He does not divide by <Math mode="inline" tex="|T^{-1}(x)|" text="absolute-value@(T ^ (- 1) * x)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. However,
it is easy to see that the two <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.Thmthm2.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-correspondences are isomorphic.
The following theorem is due to Deaconu <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="vD99" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Propositions 3.1 and 3.3]</cite>.
<!--  %**** String Line 400 **** -->The formulation we present is that of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="DKM01" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 7]</cite>, which
is slightly more general. The proof in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="DKM01" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> is based on the
gauge invariant uniqueness theorem found in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="FMR03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 4.1]</cite>.</p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:DeaconuIsoThm" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 3.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 3.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 3.3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">(Deaconu) Define <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota:C(X)\to C^{\ast}(G)" text="iota colon C * X to C ^ ast * G" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">X</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m1.2">G</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
by the equation</text></p>
        <equation xml:id="S3.Ex10">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\iota(\varphi)(x,k-l,y)=\varphi(x)1_{R_{0,0}}(x,k-l,y)," text="iota * varphi * vector@(x, k - l, y) = varphi * x * 1 _ R _ (list@(0, 0)) * vector@(x, k - l, y)" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.9"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.9">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.3">φ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.4"/>

                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.9.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varphi" role="UNKNOWN">φ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.6"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.6">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.1">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.2">0</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.7"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.9.2"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S3.Ex10.m1.8"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.7">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.9.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Ex10.m1.8">y</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p><text font="italic">and <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi:\mathcal{X}\to C^{*}(G)" text="psi colon X to C ^ * * G" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m2.1">G</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, by the equation <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi(\xi)=\iota(\xi)S" text="psi * xi = iota * xi * S" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3.1">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="xi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m3.2">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(i,\psi)" text="open-interval@(i, psi)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m4.2">ψ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is a faithful Cuntz-Pimsner covariant representation
of <Math mode="inline" tex="(C(X),\mathcal{X})" text="open-interval@(C * X, X)" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.1">X</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m5.2">X</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{\ast}(G)" text="C ^ ast * G" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="ast" role="MULOP">∗</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m6.1">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, whose image generates
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(G)" text="C ^ * * G" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m7.1">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and gives an isomorphism between <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(G)" text="C ^ * * G" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m8.1">G</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{O}(\mathcal{X})" text="O * X" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">O</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.Thmthm3.p1.m9.1">X</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S3.p7">
      <p>In <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="rE03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, Exel introduced a crossed product associated to an
endomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p7.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and transfer operator
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{L}" text="L" xml:id="S3.p7.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p7.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. That is, <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{L}" text="L" xml:id="S3.p7.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a positive
operator on <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> that satisfies the equation
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{L}(a\alpha(b))=\mathcal{L}(a)b" text="L * a * alpha * b = L * a * b" xml:id="S3.p7.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m8.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p7.m8.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m8.1">b</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m8.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m8.2">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
for all <Math mode="inline" tex="a,b\in A" text="list@(a, b) element-of A" xml:id="S3.p7.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m9.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m9.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m9.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m9.2">b</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Exel’s crossed product, denoted
<Math mode="inline" tex="A\rtimes_{\alpha,\mathcal{L}}\mathbb{N}" text="A right-normal-factor-semidirect-product _ (list@(alpha, L)) N" xml:id="S3.p7.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" name="rtimes" role="MULOP">⋊</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m10.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m10.2">L</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
can also be described as a relative Cuntz-Pimsner algebra, as
was accomplished by Brownlowe and Raeburn in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="BR06" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. We adopt
their perspective and assume also that <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is unital, but we don’t
assume that <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S3.p7.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is unital. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\mathcal{L}}" text="M _ L" xml:id="S3.p7.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denote the
<!--  %**** String Line 425 **** -->completion of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in the inner product <Math mode="inline" tex="\langle a,b\rangle:=\mathcal{L}(a^{*}b)" text="list@(a, b) assign L * a ^ * * b" xml:id="S3.p7.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m16.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m16.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m16.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m16.2">b</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m16.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p7.m16.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and give <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\mathcal{L}}" text="M _ L" xml:id="S3.p7.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> the right and left actions of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> defined
by the formulae <Math mode="inline" tex="m\cdot a:=m\alpha(a)" text="m cdot a assign m * alpha * a" xml:id="S3.p7.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m19.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m19.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="a\cdot m=\phi(a)m=am" text="a cdot m = phi * a * m = a * m" xml:id="S3.p7.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m20.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m20.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
As a left <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-module <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\mathcal{L}}" text="M _ L" xml:id="S3.p7.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is cyclic and the image of
<Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S3.p7.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\mathcal{L}}" text="M _ L" xml:id="S3.p7.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a cyclic vector, which we denote by
<Math mode="inline" tex="\xi_{0}" text="xi _ 0" xml:id="S3.p7.m25">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,\psi)" text="open-interval@(pi, psi)" xml:id="S3.p7.m26">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m26.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m26.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m26.1">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m26.2">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a Cuntz-Pimsner representation of
<Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\mathcal{L}}" text="M _ L" xml:id="S3.p7.m27">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p7.m28">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p7.m29">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, then the image of <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi_{0}" text="xi _ 0" xml:id="S3.p7.m30">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
in <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p7.m31">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi(\xi_{0})" text="psi * xi _ 0" xml:id="S3.p7.m32">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m32.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S3.p7.m32.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, is an isometry <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p7.m33">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, say. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,\psi)" text="open-interval@(pi, psi)" xml:id="S3.p7.m34">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m34.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m34.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m34.1">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m34.2">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is completely determined by <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S3.p7.m35">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p7.m36">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in the following sense:
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S3.p7.m37">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be a representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S3.p7.m38">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S3.p7.m39">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p7.m40">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
let <Math mode="inline" tex="V" text="V" xml:id="S3.p7.m41">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> be an isometry in <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p7.m42">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and define <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi:M_{\mathcal{L}}\to B" text="psi colon M _ L to B" xml:id="S3.p7.m43">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
by the formula, <Math mode="inline" tex="\psi(\phi(a)\xi_{0})=\pi(a)V" text="psi * phi * a * xi _ 0 = pi * a * V" xml:id="S3.p7.m44">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m44.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S3.p7.m44.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m44.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m44.1">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m44.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m44.2">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, then <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,\psi)" text="open-interval@(pi, psi)" xml:id="S3.p7.m45">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m45.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S3.p7.m45.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m45.1">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="psi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S3.p7.m45.2">ψ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is a Cuntz-Pimsner representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\mathcal{L}}" text="M _ L" xml:id="S3.p7.m46">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S3.p7.m47">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> if
and only if the following equations CP1., CP2. and CP3. are satisfied:</p>
    </para>
