          </item>
          <item xml:id="S4.I1.i3">
            <tags>
              <tag>(3)</tag>
              <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item 3</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S4.I1.i3.p1">
              <p><text font="italic">For all </text><Math mode="inline" tex="a\in C(X)" text="a element-of C * X" xml:id="S4.I1.i3.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I1.i3.p1.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I1.i3.p1.m1.1">X</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math></p>
              <equation labels="LABEL:eq:inner" xml:id="S4.E8">
                <tags>
                  <tag>(8)</tag>
                  <tag role="refnum">8</tag>
                </tags>
                <Math mode="display" tex="\iota(\beta(a))=\sum_{i=1}^{n}S_{i}\iota(a)S_{i}^{*}." text="iota * beta * a = ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ n)@(S _ i * iota * a * (S _ i) ^ *)" xml:id="S4.E8.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.E8.m1.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.3.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.E8.m1.3.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E8.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.2"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E8.m1.2">a</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
              </equation>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p4">
      <p>The proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:StaceyXpd2"/> is a straightforward calculation
and so will be omitted. Nevertheless, there are several useful points
to be raised about the result.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p5">
      <p>Suppose, quite generally, that <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p5.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S4.p5.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra and that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.p5.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is an endomorphism of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p5.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Then the powers of <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.p5.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
can be used to build an inductive system <Math mode="inline" tex="(\{A_{n}\}_{n=0}^{\infty},\{\alpha_{m,n}\}_{m\geq n})" text="open-interval@(((set@(A _ n)) _ (n = 0)) ^ infinity, (set@(alpha _ (list@(m, n)))) _ (m &gt;= n))" xml:id="S4.p5.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m6.3"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m6.4"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m6.3">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m6.3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m6.3.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m6.4">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m6.4.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m6.4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m6.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m6.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m6.1">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m6.2">n</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
in a familiar fashion: one takes <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{n}" text="A _ n" xml:id="S4.p5.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to be <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p5.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S4.p5.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
and sets <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha_{m,n}:=\alpha^{m-n}" text="alpha _ (list@(m, n)) assign alpha ^ (m - n)" xml:id="S4.p5.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m10.1">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m10.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, when <Math mode="inline" tex="m\geq n" text="m &gt;= n" xml:id="S4.p5.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. The inductive
limit of this system, <Math mode="inline" tex="A_{\infty}" text="A _ infinity" xml:id="S4.p5.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, exists, but may be zero. In the
event the limit is not <Math mode="inline" tex="0" text="0" xml:id="S4.p5.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, then, as Stacey proves in Proposition
3.2 of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="pS93" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, there is, for each positive integer <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S4.p5.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, a unique
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S4.p5.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.p5.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and a pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(\iota,\{t_{i}\}_{i=1}^{n})" text="open-interval@(iota, ((set@(t _ i)) _ (i = 1)) ^ n)" xml:id="S4.p5.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m17.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m17.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m17.1">ι</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m17.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m17.2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m17.2.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> consisting
of a <Math mode="inline" tex="*" text="*" xml:id="S4.p5.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>-homomorphism <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota:A\to B" text="iota colon A to B" xml:id="S4.p5.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{\iota}(1_{M(A)})=1_{M(B)}" text="overline@(iota) * 1 _ (M * A) = 1 _ (M * B)" xml:id="S4.p5.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m20.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m20.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m20.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m20.1">A</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m20.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m20.2">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{\iota}" text="overline@(iota)" xml:id="S4.p5.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denotes the extension of <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S4.p5.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to the
<!--  %**** String Line 575 **** -->multiplier algebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p5.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="M(A)" text="M * A" xml:id="S4.p5.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m24.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m24.1">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and a family of isometries in
the multiplier algebra of <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.p5.m25">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\{t_{i}\}_{i=1}^{n}\subseteq M(B)" text="((set@(t _ i)) _ (i = 1)) ^ n subset-of-or-equals M * B" xml:id="S4.p5.m26">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m26.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p5.m26.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p5.m26.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p5.m26.1">B</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
such that</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S4.p6">
      <enumerate xml:id="S4.I2">
        <item xml:id="S4.I2.i1">
          <tags>
            <tag>(1)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 1</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1">
            <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\{t_{i}\}_{i=1}^{n}" text="((set@(t _ i)) _ (i = 1)) ^ n" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m1.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m1.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a Cuntz family of isometries, i.e.,
<Math mode="inline" tex="t_{i}^{*}t_{j}=\delta_{ij}1_{M(B)}" text="(t _ i) ^ * * t _ j = delta _ (i * j) * 1 _ (M * B)" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m2.1">B</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,
for <Math mode="inline" tex="i,j=1,2,\ldots,n" text="formulae@(list@(i, j) = 1, list@(2, ldots, n))" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.6"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.7"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.1">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.2">j</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.7">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.4"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.5"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.3">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.4">…</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m3.5">n</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{i=1}^{n}t_{i}t_{i}^{*}=1_{M(B)}" text="((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ n)@(t _ i * (t _ i) ^ *) = 1 _ (M * B)" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i1.p1.m4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m4.1">B</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
When <Math mode="inline" tex="n=1" text="n = 1" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="t=t_{1}" text="t = t _ 1" xml:id="S4.I2.i1.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is simply an isometry.</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S4.I2.i2">

          <para xml:id="S4.I2.i2.p1">
            <p>For all <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in A" text="a element-of A" xml:id="S4.I2.i2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(\alpha(a))=\sum_{i=1}^{n}t_{i}\iota(a)t_{i}^{*}" text="iota * alpha * a = ((sum _ (i = 1)) ^ n)@(t _ i * iota * a * (t _ i) ^ *)" xml:id="S4.I2.i2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i2.p1.m2.3"/>

                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i2.p1.m2.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i2.p1.m2.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i2.p1.m2.1">a</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>

                          <XMWrap>

              </Math>.</p>

        <item xml:id="S4.I2.i3">
          <tags>

          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1">
            <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,\{T_{i}\}_{i=1}^{n})" text="open-interval@(pi, ((set@(T _ i)) _ (i = 1)) ^ n)" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1.1">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1.2.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m1.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a family consisting of a
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-representation
of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on a Hilbert space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and a Cuntz family of isometries <Math mode="inline" tex="\{T_{i}\}_{i=1}^{n}" text="((set@(T _ i)) _ (i = 1)) ^ n" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m5.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m5.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
in <Math mode="inline" tex="B(H)" text="B * H" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m6.1">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, then there is a nondegenerate representation <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi\times T)" text="pi * T" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m7.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>
of <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> so that <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi\times T)\circ\iota=\pi" text="(pi * T) compose iota = pi" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m10.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m10.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi\times T)(t_{i})=T_{i}" text="pi * T * t _ i = T _ i" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m11.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m11.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m11.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m11.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="i=1,2\ldots,n" text="i = list@(1, 2 * ldots, n)" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12.1">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID">…</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m12.2">n</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. (The family <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,\{T_{i}\}_{i=1}^{n})" text="open-interval@(pi, ((set@(T _ i)) _ (i = 1)) ^ n)" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13.1">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13.2.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m13.2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is called
a <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">Cuntz-covariant representation of order</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m14">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of the system
<Math mode="inline" tex="(A,\alpha)" text="open-interval@(A, alpha)" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m15">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m15.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i3.p1.m15.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m15.1">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i3.p1.m15.2">α</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.)</p>
          </para>
        </item>
        <item xml:id="S4.I2.i4">
          <tags>
            <tag>(4)</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">4</tag>
            <tag role="typerefnum">item 4</tag>
          </tags>
          <para xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1">
            <p><Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>

              </Math> is the <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-algebra generated by <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(A)" text="iota * A" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i4.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m3.1">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and elements
of the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota(a)t_{i}" text="iota * a * t _ i" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.I2.i4.p1.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m4.1">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="i=1,2,\ldots,n" text="i = list@(1, 2, ldots, n)" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in A" text="a element-of A" xml:id="S4.I2.i4.p1.m6">
                <XMath>

          </para>
        </item>
      </enumerate>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_defn" inlist="thm theorem:defn" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4">
      <tags>
        <tag>Definition 4.4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 4.4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 4.4</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1">
        <p>The <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-algebra <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> just described is called <!--  %**** String Line 600 **** --><text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">the Stacey
crossed product of order <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> determined by <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text>, and
is denoted <Math mode="inline" tex="A\rtimes_{n}^{\alpha}\mathbb{N}" text="A (right-normal-factor-semidirect-product _ n) ^ alpha N" xml:id="S4.Thmthm4.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" name="rtimes" role="MULOP">⋊</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p7">
      <p>Note that when <Math mode="inline" tex="n=1" text="n = 1" xml:id="S4.p7.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, the endomorphism in a Stacey crossed product
of order <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S4.p7.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> cannot be unital if the embedding <Math mode="inline" tex="\iota" text="iota" xml:id="S4.p7.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is injective.
This happens if and only if there is a Cuntz-covariant representation
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi,T)" text="open-interval@(pi, T)" xml:id="S4.p7.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m4.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m4.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m4.1">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m4.2">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of order <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S4.p7.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with a faithful <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.p7.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. In the setting
of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:StaceyXpdRep"/>, it is clear that <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.p7.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is not
unital by virtue of equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:Stacey1"/>). Also, by virtue
of equation 1. in the statement of that theorem it is natural to speculate
about the relation between <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(G)" text="C ^ * * G" xml:id="S4.p7.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m9.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m9.1">G</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and the Stacey crossed product
of order <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S4.p7.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> determined by <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})" text="C ^ * * R _ infinity" xml:id="S4.p7.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m11.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m11.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.p7.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. It
turns out that the crossed product that Exel would associate to
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})" text="C ^ * * R _ infinity" xml:id="S4.p7.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m13.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m13.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S4.p7.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{L}" text="L" xml:id="S4.p7.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="rE03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and which he would
denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})\rtimes_{\alpha,\mathcal{L}}\mathbb{N}" text="(C ^ * * R _ infinity) right-normal-factor-semidirect-product _ (list@(alpha, L)) N" xml:id="S4.p7.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" name="rtimes" role="MULOP">⋊</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m16.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m16.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m16.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m16.2">L</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m16.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m16.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
is isomorphic to <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})\rtimes_{1}^{\alpha}\mathbb{N}" text="(C ^ * * R _ infinity) (right-normal-factor-semidirect-product _ 1) ^ alpha N" xml:id="S4.p7.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" name="rtimes" role="MULOP">⋊</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m17.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m17.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
by his <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="rE03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem 4.7]</cite>. On the other hand, Brownlowe and
Raeburn show that Exel’s algebra
<Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}(R_{\infty})\rtimes_{\alpha,\mathcal{L}}\mathbb{N}" text="(C ^ * * R _ infinity) right-normal-factor-semidirect-product _ (list@(alpha, L)) N" xml:id="S4.p7.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" role="MULOP">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="right-normal-factor-semidirect-product" name="rtimes" role="MULOP">⋊</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m18.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m18.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m18.1">α</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m18.2">L</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m18.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.p7.m18.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is isomorphic to the relative Cuntz-Pimsner algebra determined the
ideal <Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{A\alpha(A)A}\cap J" text="overline@(A * alpha * A * A) intersection J" xml:id="S4.p7.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP">∩</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m19.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m19.1">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="A=C^{*}(R_{\infty})" text="A = C ^ * * R _ infinity" xml:id="S4.p7.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m20.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>

                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math><note mark="2" role="footnote" xml:id="footnote2"><tags>

            <XMath>

          </Math>, that
have all the properties of a Cuntz-Pimsner representation except that
the equation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(a)=(\psi,\pi)^{(1)}(\phi(a))" text="pi * a = (open-interval@(psi, pi)) ^ 1 * phi * a" xml:id="footnote2.m12">
            <XMath>

                    <XMWrap>

                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="footnote2.m12.4">π</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="footnote2.m12.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="footnote2.m12.1">1</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="footnote2.m12.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="footnote2.m12.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="footnote2.m12.5"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="footnote2.m12.5">a</XMTok>

                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is assumed to hold
only for <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in K" text="a element-of K" xml:id="footnote2.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. See <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="MS98" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="FMR03" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>, where the
basic theory of such algebras is developed.</note>. Now in this situation <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S4.p7.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> coincides with <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.p7.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> because <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi(1)=\phi(P)" text="phi * 1 = phi * P" xml:id="S4.p7.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m23.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S4.p7.m23.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p7.m23.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p7.m23.2">P</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="P=SS^{*}" text="P = S * S ^ *" xml:id="S4.p7.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
