                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p1.m25.1">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that</p>
      <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="A0.EGx3">
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex21">
          <MathFork>
            <Math tex="\displaystyle\pi(\iota(\alpha(f)))=\pi(S_{1})\pi(\iota(f))\pi(S_{1})^{*}+\pi(S%&#10;_{2})\pi(\iota(f))\pi(S_{2})^{*}," text="pi * iota * alpha * f = pi * S _ 1 * pi * iota * f * pi * (S _ 1) ^ * + pi * S _ 2 * pi * iota * f * pi * (S _ 2) ^ *" xml:id="S6.Ex21.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex21.m4.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex21.m4.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex21.m4.4.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex21.m4.4.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="iota" role="UNKNOWN">ι</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S6.Ex21.m4.4.1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex21.m4.4.1.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex21.m4.1"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex21.m4.1">f</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>

      <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in C(\mathbb{T})" text="f element-of C * T" xml:id="S6.p1.m26">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p1.m26.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p1.m26.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, which is equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eq:inner"/>).
We note in passing that there are many filter banks and that given
any <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{1}" text="m _ 1" xml:id="S6.p1.m27">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{X}" text="X" xml:id="S6.p1.m28">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\langle m_{1},m_{1}\rangle=1" text="list@(m _ 1, m _ 1) = 1" xml:id="S6.p1.m29">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p1.m29.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p1.m29.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p1.m29.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p1.m29.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
we obtain a filter bank <Math mode="inline" tex="\{m_{1},m_{2}\}" text="set@(m _ 1, m _ 2)" xml:id="S6.p1.m30">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p1.m30.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p1.m30.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.p1.m30.1">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.p1.m30.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math> if we take <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{2}" text="m _ 2" xml:id="S6.p1.m31">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> to
be the function defined by the equation</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex22">
        <Math mode="display" tex="m_{2}(z):=z\overline{m_{1}(-z)}." text="m _ 2 * z assign z * overline@(m _ 1 * (- z))" xml:id="S6.Ex22.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex22.m1.3"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex22.m1.3">
                  <XMTok meaning="assign" role="RELOP">:=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex22.m1.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex22.m1.2">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex22.m1.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex22.m1.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>All other possibilities for <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{2}" text="m _ 2" xml:id="S6.p1.m32">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are obtained from this choice
by multiplying it by <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta(z^{2})" text="theta * z ^ 2" xml:id="S6.p1.m33">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p1.m33.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p1.m33.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="\theta" text="theta" xml:id="S6.p1.m34">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is a continuous
function of modulus <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S6.p1.m35">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S6.p2">
      <p>The key to building wavelets from the Cuntz relations is to build
the minimal unitary extension of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(S_{1})" text="pi * S _ 1" xml:id="S6.p2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p2.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This was observed
by Bratteli and Jorgensen in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="BJ97" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. However, we follow Larsen
and Raeburn <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="LR06" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> who use the inductive limit approach advanced
by Douglas <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="rD69" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>. Here is the basic setup: Form the inductive
system</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex23">
        <Math mode="display" tex="H_{n}\lx@stackrel{{\scriptstyle S_{m,n}}}{{\longrightarrow}}H_{m}" text="H _ n longrightarrow ^ (S _ (list@(m, n))) H _ m" xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMApp role="RELOP">
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMTok name="longrightarrow" role="ARROW">⟶</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex23.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex23.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1.1">m</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex23.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}=L^{2}(\mathbb{T})" text="H _ n = L ^ 2 * T" xml:id="S6.p2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m2.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S6.p2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and the “linking
maps” <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{m,n}:H_{n}\to H_{m}" text="S _ (list@(m, n)) colon H _ n to H _ m" xml:id="S6.p2.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m4.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m4.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m4.1">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m4.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, are simply the powers of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(S_{1})" text="pi * S _ 1" xml:id="S6.p2.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m5.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p2.m5.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>:
<Math mode="inline" tex="S_{m,n}=\pi(S_{1})^{m-n}" text="S _ (list@(m, n)) = pi * (S _ 1) ^ (m - n)" xml:id="S6.p2.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m6.1">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m6.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m6.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p2.m6.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We let <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{\infty}" text="H _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p2.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denote the inductive
<!--  %**** String Line 750 **** -->limit <Math mode="inline" tex="\underrightarrow{\lim}(\{H_{n}\},\{S_{m,n}\}\}" text="underrightarrow@(limit) * list@(set@(H _ n), set@(S _ (list@(m, n))))" xml:id="S6.p2.m8">
          <XMath>

                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                  <XMDual xml:id="S6.p2.m8.4">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="set"/>

                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S6.p2.m8.4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m8.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m8.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m8.1">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m8.2">n</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and we
let <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{\infty,n}:H_{n}\to H_{\infty}" text="S _ (list@(infinity, n)) colon H _ n to H _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p2.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>

                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                    <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m9.2"/>

                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p2.m9.1">∞</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p2.m9.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> denote the limit embeddings.
Then there is a unique unitary <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S6.p2.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{\infty}" text="H _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p2.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> so that</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex24">
        <Math mode="display" tex="US_{\infty,n+1}=S_{\infty,n+1}\pi(S_{1})=S_{\infty,n}," text="U * S _ (list@(infinity, n + 1)) = S _ (list@(infinity, n + 1)) * pi * S _ 1 = S _ (list@(infinity, n))" xml:id="S6.Ex24.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex24.m1.7"/>

                      </XMDual>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

                        <XMWrap>

                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex24.m1.4">

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex24.m1.7.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex24.m1.7.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S6.p2.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. This map <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S6.p2.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the minimal isometric extension of
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(S_{1})" text="pi * S _ 1" xml:id="S6.p2.m14">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p2.m14.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p2.m14.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. We want to uncover a bit more structure in <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S6.p2.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</p>
    </para>
    <para xml:id="S6.p3">
      <p>To this end, observe that for <Math mode="inline" tex="m,n\geq 0" text="list@(m, n) &gt;= 0" xml:id="S6.p3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m1.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m1.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m1.1">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,</p>
      <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_eqnarray" xml:id="A0.EGx4">
        <equation xml:id="S6.Ex26">
          <MathFork>
            <Math tex="\displaystyle{(S}_{m,n}\xi)(z)=2^{(m-n)/2}m_{1}(z)m_{1}(z^{2})\cdots m_{1}(z^{%&#10;2^{(m-n)-1}})\xi(z^{2^{(m-n)}})." text="S _ (list@(m, n)) * xi * z = 2 ^ ((m - n) / 2) * m _ 1 * z * m _ 1 * z ^ 2 * cdots * m _ 1 * z ^ 2 ^ (m - n - 1) * xi * z ^ 2 ^ (m - n)" xml:id="S6.Ex26.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.Ex26.m4.8"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex26.m4.8">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

      </equationgroup>
      <p>Analysis of Dutkay and Jorgensen in <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="DJ05" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="DJ06" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Proposition 2.2]</cite>
leads to an explicit identification of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{\infty}" text="H _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p3.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\mathbb{T}_{\infty},\tilde{\mu})" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T _ infinity, tilde@(mu))" xml:id="S6.p3.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m3.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m3.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m3.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m3.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{T}_{\infty}" text="T _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p3.m4">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the 2-adic solenoid and <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\mu}" text="tilde@(mu)" xml:id="S6.p3.m5">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is a measure built from Lebesgue measure on <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{T}" text="T" xml:id="S6.p3.m6">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> and the
transfer operator associated with <Math mode="inline" tex="|m_{1}|^{2}" text="(absolute-value@(m _ 1)) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.p3.m7">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m7.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m7.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>:</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex27">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\mathcal{L}_{m_{1}}(f)(z)=\frac{1}{|T^{-1}(x)|}\sum_{w^{2}=z}|m_{1}(w)|^{2}f(w)." text="L _ m _ 1 * f * z = (1 / absolute-value@(T ^ (- 1) * x)) * (sum _ (w ^ 2 = z))@((absolute-value@(m _ 1 * w)) ^ 2 * f * w)" xml:id="S6.Ex27.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex27.m1.7"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex27.m1.7">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex27.m1.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex27.m1.3">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex27.m1.4"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex27.m1.4">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S6.Ex27.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex27.m1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex27.m1.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>

                            </XMDual>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>The representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S6.p3.m8">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="C(\mathbb{T})" text="C * T" xml:id="S6.p3.m9">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m9.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\mu)" text="L ^ 2 * mu" xml:id="S6.p3.m10">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>

                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m10.1"/>

                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m10.1">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> extends
to a representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S6.p3.m11">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="C(\mathbb{T})" text="C * T" xml:id="S6.p3.m12">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on
<Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\mathbb{T}_{\infty},\tilde{\mu})" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T _ infinity, tilde@(mu))" xml:id="S6.p3.m13">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

          </XMath>
        </Math>
via the formula</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex28">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\rho(f)\xi(z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)=f(z_{1})\xi(z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)," text="rho * f * xi * vector@(z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots) = f * z _ 1 * xi * vector@(z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots)" xml:id="S6.Ex28.m1">

      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="\xi\in L^{2}(\mathbb{T}_{\infty},\tilde{\mu})" text="xi element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T _ infinity, tilde@(mu))" xml:id="S6.p3.m14">

              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, and where,
recall, points in <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{T}_{\infty}" text="T _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p3.m15">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> are sequences <Math mode="inline" tex="(z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)" text="vector@(z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots)" xml:id="S6.p3.m16">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m16.1"/>

              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m16.2">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>

                <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m16.3">

              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
<!--  %**** String Line 775 **** -->such that <Math mode="inline" tex="z_{k}=z_{k+1}^{2}" text="z _ k = (z _ (k + 1)) ^ 2" xml:id="S6.p3.m17">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, for all <Math mode="inline" tex="k\geq 1" text="k &gt;= 1" xml:id="S6.p3.m18">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. Also, the measure
<Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\mu}" text="tilde@(mu)" xml:id="S6.p3.m19">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is quasi-invariant for the extension <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{\infty}" text="T _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p3.m20">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
of the map <Math mode="inline" tex="T" text="T" xml:id="S6.p3.m21">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{T}" text="T" xml:id="S6.p3.m22">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, defined on <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{T}_{\infty}" text="T _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p3.m23">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
by the formula <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{\infty}(z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)=(z_{1}^{2},z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)" text="T _ infinity * vector@(z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots) = vector@((z _ 1) ^ 2, z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots)" xml:id="S6.p3.m24">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m24.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m24.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p3.m24.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.5"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.6"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.7"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m24.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m24.5">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m24.6">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m24.7">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.p3.m24.2">…</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>,
and <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S6.p3.m25">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is given by the formula</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex29">
        <Math mode="display" tex="U\xi(z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)=\xi(z_{1}^{2},z_{1},z_{2},\ldots)J^{\frac{1}{2}}(z_{1%&#10;},z_{2},\ldots)," text="U * xi * vector@(z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots) = xi * vector@((z _ 1) ^ 2, z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots) * J ^ (1 / 2) * vector@(z _ 1, z _ 2, ldots)" xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.1">…</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.5"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.5">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.2">…</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="script" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.6"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.4.7"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S6.Ex29.m1.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.6">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.4.7">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="ldots" role="ID" xml:id="S6.Ex29.m1.3">…</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="J" text="J" xml:id="S6.p3.m26">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> is the Radon-Nikodym derivative with respect to <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\mu}" text="tilde@(mu)" xml:id="S6.p3.m27">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
of the translate of <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\mu}" text="tilde@(mu)" xml:id="S6.p3.m28">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{\infty}" text="T _ infinity" xml:id="S6.p3.m29">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> . The pair <Math mode="inline" tex="(\rho,U)" text="open-interval@(rho, U)" xml:id="S6.p3.m30">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m30.1"/>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m30.2"/>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m30.1">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m30.2">U</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
is a covariant pair:</p>
      <equation xml:id="S6.Ex30">
        <Math mode="display" tex="\rho(f\circ T_{\infty})=U\rho(f)U^{-1}," text="rho * (f compose T _ infinity) = U * rho * f * U ^ (- 1)" xml:id="S6.Ex30.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.Ex30.m1.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex30.m1.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex30.m1.2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.Ex30.m1.2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="compose" name="circ" role="MULOP">∘</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.Ex30.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.Ex30.m1.1">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
      </equation>
      <p>for all <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in C(\mathbb{T})" text="f element-of C * T" xml:id="S6.p3.m31">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m31.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m31.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>. To build the wavelet associated with
the filter bank, we need to get from <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\mathbb{T}_{\infty},\tilde{\mu})" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T _ infinity, tilde@(mu))" xml:id="S6.p3.m32">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m32.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m32.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m32.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m32.1">
                    <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
to <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(\mathbb{R})" text="L ^ 2 * R" xml:id="S6.p3.m33">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m33.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m33.1">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> in a unitary fashion that transforms <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S6.p3.m34">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
into <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S6.p3.m35">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math>, which recall is given by the formula <Math mode="inline" tex="D\xi(x)=\sqrt{2}\xi(2x)," text="D * xi * x = square-root@(2) * xi * 2 * x" xml:id="S6.p3.m36">
          <XMath>
            <XMDual>
              <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m36.2"/>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m36.2">
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m36.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m36.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m36.2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m36.2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMDual>
          </XMath>
        </Math>
and transforms <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S6.p3.m37">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math> into the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\tilde{\rho}(f)\xi(x)=f(e^{2\pi ix})\xi(x)" text="tilde@(rho) * f * xi * x = f * e ^ (2 * pi * i * x) * xi * x" xml:id="S6.p3.m38">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="tilde" role="OVERACCENT" stretchy="false">~</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m38.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m38.1">f</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m38.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m38.2">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m38.4"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S6.p3.m38.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="xi" role="UNKNOWN">ξ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S6.p3.m38.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S6.p3.m38.3">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.
This is accomplished with the aid of a famous theorem of Mallat.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:thm:Mallat" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 6.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 6.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 6.1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">(Mallat <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="sM89" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Theorem
2]</cite>) Suppose <Math mode="inline" tex="m_{1}" text="m _ 1" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, which is a unit vector
in the <Math mode="inline" tex="C^{*}" text="C ^ *" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>-correspondence <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathcal{X}" text="X" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, satisfies the additional
two hypotheses:

        <p><text font="italic">Then the product <Math mode="inline" tex="\prod_{k=1}^{\infty}m_{1}(e^{2\pi i2^{-k}t})" text="((product _ (k = 1)) ^ infinity)@(m _ 1 * e ^ (2 * pi * i * 2 ^ (- k) * t))" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m4">

                      <XMWrap>

                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> converges
on <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{R}" text="R" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMath>

              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>

              <XMath>

                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Further, for all <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in\mathbb{R}" text="x element-of R" xml:id="S6.Thmthm1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math></text></p>
